name: Dashboard
description: Represents a dashboard, which is a visual representation of key business metrics and performance indicators.
summary:
The `Dashboard` object in Salesforce is used to represent and manage dashboards within the application. It contains various attributes detailing the characteristics and metadata associated with a dashboard. Here's a summary of its attributes:

1. **Identification and Metadata:**
   - `Id`: Unique identifier for the dashboard (type: id).
   - `IsDeleted`: Indicates if the dashboard is deleted (type: boolean).
   - `FolderId`: Reference to the folder containing the dashboard (type: reference).
   - `FolderName`: Name of the folder containing the dashboard (type: string).
   - `Title`: Title of the dashboard (type: string).
   - `DeveloperName`: Developer name for the dashboard (type: string).
   - `NamespacePrefix`: Namespace prefix if the dashboard is part of a managed package (type: string).
   - `Description`: Description of the dashboard (type: string).

2. **Layout and Appearance:**
   - `LeftSize`, `MiddleSize`, `RightSize`: Sizes of the respective dashboard sections (type: picklist).
   - `TitleColor`, `TitleSize`, `TextColor`, `BackgroundStart`, `BackgroundEnd`: Attributes related to the visual styling of the dashboard (type: int).
   - `BackgroundDirection`: Direction of the background gradient (type: picklist).
   - `ColorPalette`, `ChartTheme`: Color and theme settings for the dashboard (type: picklist).

3. **Audit and Usage Information:**
   - `CreatedDate`: Date and time when the dashboard was created (type: datetime).
   - `CreatedById`: Reference to the user who created the dashboard (type: reference).
   - `LastModifiedDate`: Date and time when the dashboard was last modified (type: datetime).
   - `LastModifiedById`: Reference to the user who last modified the dashboard (type: reference).
   - `SystemModstamp`: System timestamp for the last modification (type: datetime).
   - `LastViewedDate`: Date and time when the dashboard was last viewed (type: datetime).
   - `LastReferencedDate`: Date and time when the dashboard was last referenced (type: datetime).

4. **Execution and Display:**
   - `RunningUserId`: Reference to the user running the dashboard (type: reference).
   - `Type`: Type of the dashboard (type: picklist).
   - `DashboardResultRefreshedDate`: String representation of the last refresh date (type: string).
   - `DashboardResultRunningUser`: String representation of the user running the dashboard (type: string).

These attributes collectively manage the definition, appearance, and audit information for dashboards within Salesforce.
label: Dashboard
